DOC.criteria: Healthy men postmenopausal woman Medical History Concurrent Diseases Gastrointestinal disease Gastrointestinal bleeding disorder History peptic ulcer disease History cholecystectomy History seizure disorder History asthma History Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease History cardiac conduction abnormality , include limited `` sick sinus syndrome '' unexplained syncopal episode Inability tolerate oral medication Inability venipunctured and/or tolerate venous access
